      • linEqX

        public float linEqX(float direction,
                    float xPoint,
                    float yPoint,
                    float yEnd)
        Get the X value from a given y point, calculated by simple linear algebra: y=ax+b. Reformulated to x=(y-b)/a
        Parameters:
        direction - a = Dy/Dx direction of the line.
        xPoint - X coordinate of a point the line will cross
        yPoint - Y coordinate of a point the line will cross
        yEnd - The Y limit the line will intersect with
        Returns:

      • linEqY

        public float linEqY(float direction,
                    float xPoint,
                    float yPoint,
                    float xEnd)
        Get the Y value from a given y point, calculated by simple linear algebra: y=ax+b.
        Parameters:
        direction - a = Dy/Dx direction of the line.
        xPoint - X coordinate of a point the line will cross
        yPoint - Y coordinate of a point the line will cross
        xEnd - The X limit the line will intersect with
        Returns:
